item.title: Watch: Senate Banking Committee holds confirmation hearing for Trump Fed nominee Miran
item.description: Stephen Miran, President Donald Trump's nominee for the open Fed governor post vacated by Adriana Kugler, will come under scrutiny from lawmakers.

item.title: T. Rowe Price shares rocket higher after deal where Goldman will invest $1 billion in asset manager
item.description: Goldman will buy up to $1 billion in T. Rowe Price common stock through open-market purchases with the intention to own up to 3.5%.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Salesforce, American Eagle, Hewlett Packard Enterprise and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: Nasdaq's listing plans will make it harder for small Chinese companies to go public in the U.S.
item.description: The move comes as tensions between the U.S. and China simmer, and as the Nasdaq faces broader financial market issues.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: American Eagle, Salesforce, C3.ai, Gitlab and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.
